items.title: Why was there a wall near runway at S Korea plane crash airport?
items.description: An air safety expert says lives could have been saved if the "obstruction" was not there.

items.title: Parents of Belgrade school shooter jailed
items.description: Vladimir Kecmanoviæ and Miljana Kecmanoviæ will serve jail terms of 14 and three years respectively.

items.title: Grief and anger from families at South Korea airport
items.description: The BBC's Jean Mackenzie speaks to bereaved relatives waiting to know more about the Jeju Air crash.

items.title: Trinidad and Tobago declares emergency as murders soar
items.description: The country has one of the highest homicide rates in the region, with more than 620 killed this year.

items.title: US to hold national day of mourning for Jimmy Carter
items.description: The 39th president of the United States will be remembered in a state funeral in Washington and ceremonies in Atlanta.
